text: Tudor Casapu or Fedor Kassapu () (born 18 September 1963 in Mingir) is a Moldovan weightlifter, World Champion and Olympic Champion. He won a gold medal at the 1990 World Weightlifting Championships, and a gold medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Hîncești District Category:Moldovan male weightlifters Category:Soviet male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of the Unified Team Category:Weightlifters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Unified Team Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Olympics
title: Tudor Casapu
